data.name: RPG Maker MV - Twilight Shrine: Japanese Resource Pack
data.detailed_description:
Introducing the awaited KADOKAWA official resource series from the RPG Maker MV developer team! The first Japanese trilogy is packed with sounds and tilesets to express themes of "light" "darkness" and "twilight" in a Japanese flavor. These resources are suitable not only for Japanese RPGs but also just right to present a cyber appearance. Also, as a special perk for buying, we've resized battler data from XP to fit MV and included several pieces in each package.

Materials included in Japanese Resource Pack No.1-3 "Twilight Shrine"


- BGM
City 1 / City 2 / Village 1 / Village 2 / Shrine 1 / Shrine 2
Temple Hall 1 / Temple Hall 2 / Congratulations / Pleasant

- BGS
Rustling Wind 1 / Rustling Wind 2 / Rustling Wind 3 / Temple Ambience
Pond 2 / Voice of the Cicadas 1 / Voice of the Cicadas 2 / Voice of the Songbird / Grandfather Clock

- ME
Inn Jingle 1 / Inn Jingle 2 / Gag 1 /Gag 2 /Serious 2

- SE
Handwashing Place 1 / Handwashing Place 2 / Storehouse Key / Storehouse Door 1
Storehouse Door 2 / Shamisen / Offering Box / Voice of the Crow / Pond 1 / Window 1 / Window 2

-Tilesets
Handwashing Hut / Torii Gate / Storehouse / Lantern / Lion-Dogs
Sacred Tree / Pond, Shrine (Outer Walls+Roof) and other resources for use with shrines

- Bonus: RPG Maker XP Battler Data
Fighter08 / Gunner01 / Snake02 / Goblin03 / Bird04


Sample (SoundCloud)
https://soundcloud.com/rpg-maker/twilight-shrine

* This resource pack is one part of a trilogy of Japanese resources. You can check out other two packs below
http://store.steampowered.com/app/558760
http://store.steampowered.com/app/558761

data.short_description: Introducing the awaited official resource series from the RPG Maker MV developer team! The first Japanese trilogy is packed with sounds and tilesets to express themes of "light" "darkness" and "twilight" in a Japanese flavor.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
